review: I was able to easily install the fire stick on my non-smart tv.  I am looking forward to having Nexflix available on same.  I was disappointed in the remote provided with this package.  After pushing and pulling on the cover of same,  I called amazon and was told to pry off with a butter knife.  This seems to me to be a shoddy design.  They could have at least put this in the instructions.
